thread.title: Zionist settlement and two military headquarters are bombed by Hezbollah » Iraqi News Agency
thread.title_full: Zionist settlement and two military headquarters are bombed by Hezbollah » Iraqi News Agency

author: @ina__news
title: Zionist settlement and two military headquarters are bombed by Hezbollah » Iraqi News Agency
text: Follow-up - INA The Lebanese Hezbollah announced, today, Thursday, the bombing of a Zionist settlement and two military headquarters. The party said in successive statements that "the Islamic Resistance fighters bombed the Ahihud settlement with 50 rockets in support of Palestine and in defense of Lebanon and its people.". It added that "the Islamic Resistance fighters also bombed the headquarters of the Northern Region Command in the Dado base with waves of rockets, as well as the reserve headquarters of the Northern Corps and the Galilee Division's base and warehouses in Amiad." [ Hezbollah declares bombing of a colony and a Zionist intelligence headquarters ](https://ina.iq/eng/35043-hezbollah-declares-bombing-of-a-colony-and-a-zionist-intelligence-headquarters.html) [ Antarctica’s 'doomsday' glacier is heading for catastrophic collapse ](https://ina.iq/eng/34876-antarcticas-doomsday-glacier-is-heading-for-catastrophic-collapse.html) [ PM: Pushing forward the relations between Iraq and Somalia is necessary ](https://ina.iq/eng/34979-pm-pushing-forward-relations-between-iraq-and-somalia-is-necessary.html)
